  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Interpolación</string>
            <string language="en">Interpolation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interpolation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interpolation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interpolation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interpolazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρεμβολή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el problema de la interpolación polinómica. Se estudia la interpolación lineal y la cuadrática y se muestran el método de Newton y el polinomio interpolador de Lagrange.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the problem of polynomial interpolation. It studies linear and quadratic interpolation and teaches Newton's method and Lagrange's polynomial interpolation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interpolación</string>
            <string language="en">interpolation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">método de Newton</string>
            <string language="en">Newton's method</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrática</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polinomios</string>
            <string language="en">polynomials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polinomio de Lagrange</string>
            <string language="en">Lagrange's polynomial</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Problem polynomischer Interpolation zu studieren. 
Sie studiert lineare und quadratische Interpolation und 
unterrichtet Methode des Newtons und Lagranges polynomische 
Interpolation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le problème de l'interpolation polynôme. 
Elle étudie l'interpolation linéaire et quadratique et 
enseigne la méthode de newton et l'interpolation polynôme de 
Lagrange.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
problema do interpolation polynomial. Estuda o interpolation 
linear e quadrático e ensina o método do newton e o interpolation 
polynomial de Lagrange.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il problema di interpolazione polinomiale. Studia 
l'interpolazione lineare e quadratica ed insegna il metodo del Newton 
e l'interpolazione polinomiale del Lagrance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει το πρόβλημα της πολυωνυμικής παρεμβολής. 
Μελετά τη γραμμική και δευτέρου βαθμού παρεμβολή και 
διδάσκει τη μέθοδο Newton και lagrange την πολυωνυμική 
παρεμβολή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interpolation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Methode des Newtons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polynome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polynom Lagranges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interpolation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La méthode de newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quadratique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polynômes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le polynôme de Lagrange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interpolation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Método do newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrático</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polynomials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polynomial de Lagrange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interpolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo del Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quadratico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polinomi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lineare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Polinomio del Lagrance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρεμβολή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέθοδος Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δευτέρου βαθμού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυώνυμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Lagrange πολυώνυμο</string>
          </keyword>
